articles.description: Nintendo announced on Jan. 5, 2021 that it had bought Next Level Games, the Vancouver-based studio that made 2019’s Luigi’s Mansion 3 for Nintendo Switch, and 2013’s Luigi’s Mansion: Dark Moon for Nintendo 3DS.
articles.content: Nintendo has acquired Next Level Games, the makers of Luigis Mansion 3on Nintendo Switch, the company announced on Tuesday. Vancouver-based Next Level has delivered seven titles published by Nintendo… [+843 chars]

articles.description: Over the next two years, Microsoft Outlook will be transitioning away from Mac and Windows app to web-based apps that will work on any device.
